name: Nemesis Tamatou
summary:
You play a character named "7735", thrown into a deadly Game Show known as "Nemesis Tamatou" for the entertainment of the enigmatic "BLB Crew" and their stream viewers. On your way, you can buy upgrades in the shop aiding you on your journey, meet new friends along the way (or kill them for cash) and experience the overall insanity (along with a subtle identity crisis).
This game is based on the personalities and the humor of the BLB Show Youtube Channel.
